title: Drawing, Plate Design:  Le Bélier [Aries], from Le Zodiac Travesti [The Farcical Zodiac] Service, 1824
title_raw: Plate Design:  Le Bélier [Aries], from Le Zodiac Travesti [The Farcical Zodiac] Service
medium: Pen and brown ink, brush and brown/black wash, white gouache, pink/tan watercolor, red crayon, graphite on cream laid paper, mounted on cream laid paper, image bordered in pen and brown ink
inscribed: Inscribed in pen and brown/black ink over graphite : on mount, upper center:  Le Bélier [The Ram]; on mount, lower center:  tu vas voir [over an erased graphite inscription:  attend...tu vas voir; in graphite, on mount, upper right corne:  3
description: Outdoor scene with mountains in background and large trees, left middleground.  A woman with her arm around a young boy, left foreground.  They watch two rams courting, right middleground.  Three children, left background, observe the scene from behind a fence.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, Plate Design:  Le Bélier [Aries], from Le Zodiac Travesti [The Farcical Zodiac] Service, 1824. Pen and brown ink, brush and brown/black wash, white gouache, pink/tan watercolor, red crayon, graphite on cream laid paper, mounted on cream laid paper, image bordered in pen and brown ink. 
1989-13-37.
